<script>
    let auth0 = null;

    async function configureAuth() {
        auth0 = await createAuth0Client({
            domain: "dev-0xxzru015pu8i5d0.us.auth0.com",
            redirect_uri: "https://pathttt2.netlify.app/callback"
        });

        const isAuthenticated = await auth0.isAuthenticated();

        if (isAuthenticated) {
            const user = await auth0.getUser();
            updateUI(user);
        }
    }

    async function logout() {
        const baseUrl = window.location.origin.endsWith("/") ? window.location.origin : window.location.origin + "/";
        
        await auth0.logout({
            logoutParams: {
                returnTo: baseUrl
            }
        });
    }

    function updateUI(user) {
        document.getElementById("user-info").innerText = "Welcome, " + user.email;
    }

    document.getElementById("logout").addEventListener("click", function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        logout();
    });

    window.onload = configureAuth;
</script>
